text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/README":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/README","text":"''list-inline'' adds a macro to render a selection of tiddlers as an inline list or series. <$list filter="[variables[]match[twdoc.list-macros]]" emptyMessage="Install [ext[twdoc|https://benwebber.github.io/tiddlywiki-plugins/#twdoc]] to view documentation."> <> "},"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/macros/private":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/macros/private","text":"\define list-inline-link() \whitespace trim <$link to={{!!title}}> <$let tv-wikilinks="no"> <$transclude field=<<__caption__>>> <$view field="title"/> \end "},"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/macros/public":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/macros/public","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","twdoc.description":"Render a selection of tiddlers as an inline list or series.","twdoc.param.filter":"A <> selecting the tiddlers to list.","twdoc.param.join":"A string separator joining items in the list when the list has three (3) or more items.","twdoc.param.last":"A string rendered before the last item in the list.","twdoc.param.joinLast":"Whether to render `join` before `last` in a list with three (3) or more items. In other words, render a [ext[serial comma|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serial_comma]]. Can be `yes` or `no`.","twdoc.param.caption":"Render this field, falling back on the tiddler `title`.","twdoc.param.class":"Class to add to the list ``.","twdoc.param.class.optional":"true","text":"\define list-inline(filter join:", " last:" and " joinLast:"yes" caption:"caption" class) \import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/list-inline/macros/private]] <$let filter="""$filter$""" count={{{[all[tiddlers]subfiltercount[]]}}} join={{{[compare:number:gt[2]then["""$join$"""]]}}} joinLast={{{[title[$joinLast$]match:caseinsensitive[yes]then]}}} > ] list-inline +[!is[blank]join[ ]] }}}><$list filter="[all[tiddlers]subfilterfirst[]]"><><$list filter="[all[tiddlers]subfilterbutfirst[]butlast[]]"><><><$list filter="[all[tiddlers]subfilterbutfirst[]last[]]"><>$last$<> \end "}}}
